articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects KPA Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects KPA Unit
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il inspected Unit 1811 under the KPA Artillery Command and watched its firing exercise.
					 He was greeted on the spot by Col. General Ri Jong Bu, KPA Artillery commander, and other general officers and commanding officers of the unit.
					
					 He acquainted himself with the unit's performance of guard duty. Then he mounted an observation platform where he was briefed on the plan for the exercise by the artillery commander and watched it.
					
					 The exercise strikingly demonstrated the fighting spirit and resolute determination of the servicemen to wipe out the aggressors at a single blow when they dare intrude into the inviolable land, sea and air of the DPRK even 0.001mm and protect their socialist homeland like an impregnable fortress and their merciless striking capability.
					
					 After watching the exercise conducted by the brave one-match-for-a-hundred artillerymen, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that all the servicemen are fully prepared politically and ideologically and in military technique to beat back any enemy's surprise invasion in time and defend the socialist homeland as firm as an iron wall. He highly estimated their successful exercise and set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for further developing the KPA into invincible revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 The KPA, a successor to the brilliant traditions of the anti-Japanese war, has grown not only to be fighters devoting their youth and lives to the Party, the leader, the country and the people but to be powerful revolutionary armed forces equipped with modern offensive and defensive means, he said, adding: Our socialist fortress is invulnerable and our revolutionary cause is sure to win one victory after another as we have these steel-like elite ranks, the matchless army fully tempered in the two great anti-imperialist wars and protracted and arduous struggle.
					
					 He met the servicemen who took part in the exercise and warmly encouraged them before having a photo session with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA General Ri Yong Ho, chief of the KPA General Staff, KPA General Kim Jong Gak, first vice-director of the KPA General Political Bureau, and KPA Generals Kim Myong Guk, Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su and KPA Col. Generals Kim Won Hong and Han Tong Gun and other commanding officers of the army and Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, and other senior officials of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Korean People's Will to Counter War Exercises with Just Reunification War
articles.content:
Korean People's Will to Counter War Exercises with Just Reunification War
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army and a spokesman for the KPA General Staff issued respectively a report and a statement on March 9 in connection with the fact that the U. S. imperialists and the bellicose group of south Korea have started the aggressive Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint war exercises against the DPRK, clarifying the firm stand of the revolutionary forces.
					 On receipt of the news, the army and people of Korea are expressing through mass media their will to mercilessly punish the aggressors who are running amok imprudently.
					
					 General Ri Chong Hak and officer Ju Chang Son of the KPA stated that the army will counter with resolute and merciless just war for reunification, should the aggressors intrude into the sky, land and seas of the DPRK even an inch.
					
					 Jang Hyon Chol, secretary of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, said with emphasis that all the Korean young men and women are fully ready to wipe out the enemies to the last one if they pounce upon us.
					
					 Manager of the Ranam Coal Mining Machine Complex Choe Kwan Jun and Manager of the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex Kim Kyong Su emphasized that if traitor Lee Myung Bak and his ilk dare launch a war of aggression in league with the U.S. imperialists defying our repeated warnings, we will deal a sledgehammer blow of revenge at the war-maniacs.
					
					 Ho Nam Sun, chairperson of the Management Board of the Samjigang Co-op Farm in Jaeryong County, South Hwanghae Province, and Ri Jun Ho, a work-team leader of the Joyang Co-op Farm in Hamju County, South Hamgyong Province, noted that we have ranks united in one mind stronger than A-bomb.
					
					 Vice-president of the State Academy of Sciences Ri Song Uk said that there is no limit to our counter-blow and no one can predict or evade it, warning that the U.S. imperialists and the puppet bellicose elements must not run riot at random.

articles.title: 11th Kimilsungia Festival to Be Held
articles.content:
11th Kimilsungia Festival to Be Held
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The 11th Kimilsungia Festival will take place in Pyongyang on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The festival will kick off at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition in mid-April. It will be represented by armed forces bodies, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons, working people, overseas compatriots' organizations and overseas compatriots and organizations and friends of different countries.
					
					 During the festival, immortal flower shows and visits to the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia hothouses will take place in various provinces.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Talk about "Threat from North" Snubbed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Talk about "Threat from North" Snubbed
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors was reported to have held recently a huddle called "meeting of ministers for foreign affairs and security" at which it raised a hue and cry over what it called "missile threat from the north" and "possible provocation" and discussed the issues of "examining the posture to cope with them" and "proposal for cooperation with neighboring countries." Prior to this, the puppet minister of National Defence, addressing a "commemoration meeting," pulled up the DPRK over the alleged "provocative remarks" and "a serious threat." The boss of the "Ministry of Unification" also vociferated about "nuclear threat from the north" and "provocation to south Korea."
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is nothing but a smokescreen to cover up the bellicose nature of the Lee group hell-bent on confrontation and war and realize its scenario for invading the DPRK come what may. 
					
					 The much ado made by the Lee group about "threat from the north" is no more than sheer sophism let loose by those who are working with bloodshot eyes to do harm to fellow countrymen by force of arms backed by foreign forces. 
					
					 It cites facts to prove that the military threat and danger of war now mounting on the Korean Peninsula are, in the final analysis,  a product of the hostile policy invariably pursued by the U.S. towards the DPRK and the reckless moves of the Lee group, its follower.
					
					 The outbreak of a new war on the peninsula is now becoming a reality due to the puppet warmongers going reckless, bereft of any reason, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Lee group should know well that the moves for a war of aggression frantically stepped up by it under the absurd pretext of "threat from the north" will never help it find a way out of its crisis but are as foolish as precipitating its destruction. 
					
					 Regret will not mend matters. 
					
					 The Lee group would be well advised to stop at once its reckless moves to provoke a war against the DPRK.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Sycophancy and Treachery Blasted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Sycophancy and Treachery Blasted
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- During his recent junkets to several countries including Australia and Indonesia traitor Lee Myung Bak tried to shift the responsibility for the bedeviled inter-Korean relations and the escalated tension on the Korean Peninsula on to the DPRK, raising a hue and cry over "someone's preparations for a missile launch," "refusal to have dialogue" and "creation of tension." He behaved so despicably as to solicit "support" for his "policy toward the north" wherever he went. In another development, Ri Ki Thaek, chief vice-chairman of the "advisory council for democracy, peace and unification," Lee's mean stooge, in a lecture given in Inchon, talked nonsense that unification is "possible only when there is understanding" among the neighboring countries, while letting a whole string jargons about the watchwords "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars."
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 What they uttered is nothing but despicable remarks made by those sycophantic traitors keen to realize their wild ambition to do harm to fellow countrymen through cooperation with foreign forces, devoid of even an iota of national dignity and independence and a blatant challenge to the desire of the compatriots to achieve national reunification by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					 The grave tension on the Korean Peninsula is not attributable to someone's "preparations for a missile launch" or "refusal to have dialogue" but it is a product of the Lee group of traitors' anachronistic moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 This being a hard reality, Lee had the cheek to grumble about "creation of tension" even in foreign countries, misrepresenting the nature of the situation. In doing so he sought the criminal aim of preserving and implementing at any cost his policy of confrontation and war backed by outsiders, though it is rebuffed and denounced at home.
					
					 Traitor Ri's nonsensical talk that unification is "possible only when there is understanding" among the neighboring countries is nothing but intolerable sheer sophism let loose by sycophantic traitors.
					
					 Closely following the above-mentioned behaviors of the Lee group, Koreans keenly realize once again why it is so hard to achieve the unity and reunification of the nation and why the inter-Korean relations have reached such deplorable phase as they see at present.
					
					 In order to achieve the unity and reunification of the nation as early as possible it is necessary, first of all, to make an immediate clean sweep of the group of traitors escalating the inter-Korean confrontation and standing in the way of independent reunification, counting on the support and cooperation from foreign forces.

articles.title: Conservative Forces' Moves to Destroy KCTU Slammed
articles.content:
Conservative Forces' Moves to Destroy KCTU Slammed
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions called a press conference in Seoul on Mar. 11 to denounce the conservative forces' moves to destroy the organization.
					 The organization in the press release accused the Lee Myung Bak regime, big businesses and other conservative forces of working hard to shift the responsibility for economic crisis on to the workers and conducting an operation to destroy the KCTU.
					
					 Charging that some riff-raffs are floating the sheer lie that "members of the KCTU are trying to secede from it one after another," speaking ill of it, the organization declared that standing behind them are the Lee "government" and big businesses and such worst type conservative organization as the south Korean League of New Right.
					
					 It is a trite method of the conservative regime to foster standoff and division among trade unions in a bid to impose sufferings upon the workers and suppress and exploit them whenever it faces a crisis.
					
					 The organization vowed to intensify the actions to foil the moves of the conservative forces to destroy the KCTU and win the workers' rights.

articles.title: Halt to DPRK-Targeted War Exercises Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Halt to DPRK-Targeted War Exercises Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- Members of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions staged a demonstration in protest against the joint military exercises for aggression before the "command and control centre" of the south Korea-U.S "combined forces command" in Kyonggi Province on Mar. 11.
					 The demonstrators accused the warmongers of staging Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises aimed at mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					
					 Warning that if another war breaks out on this land it will bring horrible disasters to all Koreans, they demanded an immediate halt to the on-going war maneuvers.
					
					 They called upon all the Koreans to turn out in the struggle to avert a war and achieve peace and reunification.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Observed in Italy
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Observed in Italy
 Pyongyang, March 14 (KCNA) -- An Italian preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun was inaugurated with due ceremony in Rome on Mar. 10.
					 The organizational secretary of the Struggle for the Peace and Socialism of Italy was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the inaugural ceremony.
					
					The preparatory committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Disposicion de Corea de responder con la justa guerra
articles.content:
Disposicion de Corea de responder con la justa guerra
Pyongyang, 14 de marzo (ATCC) -- En relacion con que los imperialistas norteamericanos y los belicistas surcoreanos libran los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, la Comandancia Suprema y el portavoz del Estado Mayor General, del Ejercito Popular de Corea publicaron respectivamente el dia 9 una informacion y una declaracion exponiendo la posicion rotunda de nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					  Al enterarse de ellas, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea expresan a traves de los medios de prensa su voluntad de infligir golpe demoledor a los agresores que actuan temerariamente.
					
					  El general Ri Chong Hak, y el oficial Ju Chang Son del EPC dijeron que de aparecer acaso una chispa en el cielo, la tierra y el mar de la RPDC, les responderan a los agresores con la rotunda, despiadada y justa guerra para la reunificacion.
					
					  El secretario del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, Jang Hyon Chol, apunto que los jovenes coreanos toman la firme determinacion de aniquilar despiadadamente a los enemigos que se nos arrojen.
					
					  El gerente del Complejo de Maquinas de Mina de Carbon de Ranam, Choe Kwan Jun y el titular del Complejo de Locomotoras Electricas Kim Jong Thae, Kim Kyong Su, subrayaron: si la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak desata por fin la guerra agresiva en contubernio con los imperialistas yanquis desoyendo nuestras repetidas advertencias, asestaremos un martillazo de venganza a los belicistas.
					
					  La presidenta del Comite de Administracion de la Granja Cooperativa de Samjigang del distrito de Jaeryong de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur, Ho Nam Sun, y el jefe de brigada de trabajo de la Granja Cooperativa de Joyang del distrito de Hamju de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, Ri Jun Ho, senalaron que tienen la fila de la unidad monolitica, mas poderosa que la bomba atomica.
					
					  El vicepresidente de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, Ri Song Uk, destaco que nuestro golpe de respuesta es ilimitado, imprevisible e inevitable y advirtio que los imperialistas norteamericanos y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos dejen de actuar temerariamente.

articles.title: Gremiales de la CSS libran lucha contra "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho"
articles.content:
Gremiales de la CSS libran lucha contra "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho"
Pyongyang, 14 de marzo (ATCC) -- Los gremiales de la Confederacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos libraron el dia 11 frente al "puesto de comando y control" de la "Comandancia de las fuerzas combinadas" Sur de Corea-EE.UU. una manifestacion contra los agresivos ejercicios militares conjuntos.
					  Los manifestantes condenaron a los belicistas que iniciaron los ejercicios de ataque preventivo "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" cuyo blanco es la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  Demandaron el cese inmediato de esos ejercicios militares insistiendo en que toda la nacion coreana sera la victima cuando se desate una guerra en la tierra patria.
					
					  Exhortaron a todos a levantarse en la lucha por frenar la guerra y lograr la paz y la reunificacion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun desmiente teoria de "amenaza proveniente del Norte"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun desmiente teoria de "amenaza proveniente del Norte"
 Pyongyang, 14 de marzo (ATCC) -- En la reciente "reunion de los ministros encargados de diplomacia y seguridad", la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak del Sur de Corea discutio sobre la "revision del estado de preparacion" y el "proyecto de cooperacion con los paises vecinos" hablando de la supuesta "amenaza de misiles proveniente del Norte" y las "posibilidades de provocacion".
					 Con anterioridad, el ministro titere de Defensa Nacional acuso a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en un "acto conmemorativo" de "pronunciar discursos provocativos" y "amenazar seriamente" mientras que el ministro de "Reunificacion" cuestiono tambien la supuesta "amenaza nuclear del Norte" y la "provocacion al Sur".
					
					 En un comentario individual difundido este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun revelo que tales hablillas no pasan de ser una cortina de humo para ocultar la naturaleza belicista de esa horda enloquecida por la confrontacion y la guerra y para realizar a toda costa la ambicion de agredir a la RPDC.
					
					 Sin embargo, la camarilla de Lee no se cansa de hablar de la "amenaza proveniente del Norte", lo cual es una locura de los descarados que andan rechinando los dientes para atropellar militarmente a los connacionales en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras, comienza el comentarista.
					
					 Argumenta citando datos que la amenaza militar y el peligro de guerra que existen ahora en la Peninsula Coreana,  son producto de las imprudentes maniobras de EE.UU., que practica invariablemente la politica hostil a la RPDC, y su fiel seguidora camarilla de Lee.
					
					 Por culpa de los belicistas titeres surcoreanos que andan sin razon ni juicio, crecen cada dia las posibilidades de la provocacion de nueva guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, critica.
					
					 La banda de Lee debe saber bien que sus preparativos para desatar la guerra contra la RPDC, que se impulsan circulando el absurdisimo rumor de la "amenaza del Norte", no le seran la salida de su crisis sino una tonteria que adelantara su ruina, advierte.
					
					 Como dice el refran "el arrepentimiento siempre se hace tarde", la banda de Lee debe poner fin ahora mismo, antes de que se haga tarde, a sus imprudentes maniobras para desencadenar la guerra contra la RPDC, concluye el rotativo.

articles.title: Tendra lugar el XI Festival de Kimilsungias
articles.content:
Tendra lugar el XI Festival de Kimilsungias
Pyongyang, 14 de marzo (ATCC) -- Con motivo del Dia del Sol (15 de abril, cumpleanos del Presidente Kim Il Sung), se inaugurara a mediados de abril en la capitalina Exposicion Permanente de Kimilsungias y Kimjongilias el XI Festival de esta primera flor.
					En esta edicion participaran las instituciones de las fuerzas armadas, ministerios y organos centrales, militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea y trabajadores.
					
					Ademas, asistiran los compatriotas residentes en ultramar y sus organizaciones, entidades y huespedes de varios paises del mundo.
					
					Durante el festival, se realizaran en todas las provincias las visitas a las exposiciones de esa flor y a los invernaderos de Kimilsungias y Kimjongilias.
